overview: Kenny seeks revenge against mafia leader 'Falcone' for his fathers death. Teaming up with a mysterious man named Thomas, together they try to stop the evil Falcone before he takes over the entire underground world to become the 'Lord of the City' Ken & Thomas have just a few problems... they have to rescue Sally, overcome Falcones army of Ninjas, and defeat Falcone, a man who has a pact with the Devil himself!! How do you stop a man that can't be stopped???
title: Lord of the City
